title: GOgroove BassPULSE 2MX USB Powered 2.0 Channel Computer Speakers- Works with Toshiba , HP , Asus , Acer , Dell , Sony , Samsung & more Laptops & Desktops!
description: STEP UP YOUR AUDIO!Dynamic SoundThe GOgroove BassPULSE 2MX speakers deliver crisp SonusMAX sound with enhanced bass technology. The range of audio produced by this 2.0-channel ensemble will satisfy critical audio enthusiasts and bass-fanatics alike.Elegant AestheticsThe sleek, black piano finish and unique contours pair with blue LED accents to add a splash of mood to any home, office, or portable system setup. The unique form factor combines functionality and design to bring you a product that pleases your ears AND your eyes.Easy SetupPlug-N-Play design powers from USB with no external power adapters or drivers required. Rear-loaded volume control allows for quick audio adjustment. 3.5mm audio cable plays music from your computer.Tech Specs:Speaker output power:(2.4w x 2) 4.8w RMS ; 9.6w PeakDrivers:1.5" w/ passive bass woofer - dual driver designImpedance:4 OhmsFrequency response:150Hz - 20KHzInput power:standard USB DC 5VInput audio:3.5mm audio plugDimensions:3.9 x 4.0 x 2.8 in. (each speaker)Weight:1.3 lbsUSB / Audio cable length:4 ftSpeaker separation:up to 2ft. 6in. apartCompatible With:Laptops:Apple Macbook Pro , Air , Retina / Chromebook / Toshiba Satellite , Portege (Portg) , Qosmio , Tecra / HP Ultrabook , ENVY , Folio , Pavilion / ASUS Republic of Gamers , Eee Seashell , Meego / Lenovo ThinkPad , IdeaPad , Essential / ACER Aspire S , One , AC700 , Ethos , Timeline X , TravelMate / DELL D600 , Latitude , Inspiron / Compaq / Sony Vaio / Samsung Series 3 , 5 , 7 , 9Desktops:Apple iMac , Mac Mini , G5 / Dell Inspiron , XPS / Acer Aspire , Predator , Revo , Veriton / Gateway / Sony / HP TouchSmart , Pavilion , Omni / ASUS EEBox / Lenovo ThinkCentre , IdeaCentre / CyberpowerPC Gamer Ultra , Xtreme...and many more!
